vhv-navbar-left: Content of the left side of the navbar.
vhv-navbar-right: Content of the right side of the navbar.
vhv-navbar-brand: Content of the 'brand' link. You can also use a image, e.g. set the content of the message to File:MYFILE.png (without brackets) and costumize size and positioning for .navbar-brand img.
vhv-navbar-class: Classes to use for the navbar. For further possibilities see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#navbar
vhv-subnav: Content of the sub navigation. Set to '-' to not show a sub navigation.
vhv-subnav-class: Classes to use for the subnavigation. For further possibilities see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#nav
vhv-footer: Add custom elements before or after the default content or replace the default content alltogether.
vhv-footer-custom: Additional content for the footer - will be placed between the standard text footers and the icon footers. The element's name to use for the hiding mechanisms provided by vhv is footer-custom.
vhv-footer-class: Classes to use for the footer. Add your own classes or use vhv's standard classes footer-sticky (footer will only be fixed at the bottom if the page content is smaller than the height of the screen) or footer-fixed (footer will always be fixed).
vhv-toolbox: Custom link content for toolbox dropdown. (you can also use an icon, e.g. )
vhv-login: Text used for the login link.
vhv-container-class: Should be one of 'container' or 'container-fluid'. This class is used for the navbar, the main content and the footer.
vhv-editsection-text: Text for the Edit Section Button
vhv-editsection-class: Classes to use for the Edit Section Button
vhv-editsection-icon: Icon to insert into the Edit Section Button
vhv-toc-top: Text for the 'to top' link in the TOC.
prefs-vhv-advanced-desc: Descriptive Text for the advanced features option in the preferences.
prefs-vhv-advanced-help: Help Text for the advanced features option in the preferences.
